Katie, I am so sorry. The two of you were so close.
translation.es: Katie, lo siento mucho. Ustedes dos eran muy cercanos.

translation.en: I can't imagine what a shock it was.
translation.es: No me imagino lo impactante que debe haber sido.

translation.en: If there's anything I can do...
translation.es: Si hay algo que pueda hacer...

translation.en: I would like to get another assignment as soon as possible.
translation.es: Me gustaría conseguir otro trabajo lo antes posible.

translation.en: -Oh, okay. Well, let's talk in my office. -Okay.
translation.es: - Bueno, hablemos en mi oficina. - De acuerdo.

translation.en: Hello?
Speaking.
Oh! Hi, yeah.
I agree. I thought the interview went very--
translation.es: Estoy de acuerdo. Pensé que la entrevista...

translation.en: I see.
Yeah, no, I completely understand.
Thank you for calling.
Yeah, you too.
Katie, I assumed you knew. I can't put you back to work,
translation.es: Supuse que lo sabías. No puedo darte otro trabajo.

translation.en: not until the police finish their investigation.
translation.es: No hasta que la policía termine la investigación.

translation.en: Investigation?
Well, yes, when a client expires under the supervision of an employee,
translation.es: Sí, cuando un cliente muere bajo la supervisión de un empleado,

translation.en: we cooperate with the authorities to be absolutely certain that there was...
translation.es: cooperamos con las autoridades para estar absolutamente seguros...

translation.en: you know, how would it look to a potential client that there was even any hint of--
translation.es: ¿Cómo se vería para un potencial cliente si hubiese algún indicio de que...?

translation.en: Wait, you think I had something to do with what happened to Leonard?
translation.es: ¿Cree que tuve algo que ver con lo que le pasó a Leonard?

translation.en: God, no. No, of course not.
No. This is...
I'm sorry, Katie. This is company policy.
translation.es: Lo siento, Katie. Es la política de la compañía.

translation.en: There's nothing I can do until the police officially close their investigation.
translation.es: No puedo hacer nada hasta que la policía cierre la investigación.

translation.en: So, how long is this gonna take?
Yeah, I--
I wish I knew.
Hello?
Hey.
What were you thinking?
You can't just come in here like this, like we still belong here.
translation.es: No puedes seguir viniendo como si aún perteneciéramos aquí.

translation.en: Excuse me. I'm bleeding right now. What do you want from me?
translation.es: Disculpa. Estoy sangrando. ¿Qué quieres de mí?

translation.en: We said we'd be careful, Adam!
I asked you and you promised me.
translation.es: Te lo pedí y me lo prometiste.

translation.en: -You promised. -All right. Okay!
Look, I--
I'm sorry.
But if I wasn't here, I think that money would be gone.
translation.es: Pero, si no hubiera estado aquí, el dinero habría desaparecido.

translation.en: How could anyone know about the money?
-It's Leonard's. He kept it hidden. -Why else would they be here, Katie?
translation.es: - Es de Leonard. Lo tenía escondido. - ¿Por qué más vendrían?

translation.en: You didn't see who it was? No, they came up behind me.
translation.es: - ¿No viste quién era? - No, me atacaron por atrás.

translation.en: They couldn't have known you were here.
translation.es: Seguro que no sabían que estabas aquí.

translation.en: They wouldn't have busted in like that.
I heard the glass break. That's why I came down.
translation.es: Escuché que rompieron el vidrio. Por eso bajé.

translation.en: The back door was already open.
And you didn't think maybe that was a bad sign,
translation.es: ¿Y no creíste que esa era una mala señal

translation.en: that you should get out?
No, I didn't have time to think.
The next thing I know, I was waking up to the sound of my phone ringing.
translation.es: Lo siguiente que recuerdo es que me despertó tu llamada.

translation.en: How could you do this, Adam? This never should have happened.
translation.es: ¿Cómo pudiste hacer esto? Esto no debía pasar.

translation.en: You never should have been here.
translation.es: - No deberías haber estado aquí. - ¡Ese no es el punto!

translation.en: -That's not the point! -Then what's the point?
translation.es: - No deberías haber estado aquí. - ¡Ese no es el punto! ¿Y cuál es?

translation.en: -Almost a hundred grand! That's the point. -You're always trying to justify your--
translation.es: - ¡Casi cien mil dólares! Ese es el punto. - Siempre intentas justificar...

translation.en: You counted it?
I counted to 92,000, and there was more.
Then she calls me to say how sorry she is
translation.es: Luego me llama para decirme cuánto lamenta

translation.en: that the hiring committee decided to go another way.
translation.es: que el comité de contrataciones se haya decidido por otra persona.

translation.en: Whatever the hell that means. I don't even know...
translation.es: - Lo que sea que signifique eso. - No lo sé.

translation.en: They're all just such assholes.
I'm just sick of being poor.
Who was it, Adam?
Who got in here?
Maybe somebody who did some work on the house?
translation.es: ¿Tal vez alguien que trabajó en la casa?

translation.en: -Sometime before you started. -Leonard talked about hiring a gardener,
translation.es: - Antes de que empezaras. - Leonard habló de un jardinero.

translation.en: but that was a couple of years ago.
Well, whoever it was, I don't think it was a coincidence.
translation.es: Sea quien sea, no creo que haya sido una coincidencia.

translation.en: They must have known that Leonard had passed away.
translation.es: Seguro sabían que Leonard había fallecido.

translation.en: And figured the house would be empty.
translation.es: Y pensaron que no habría nadie.

translation.en: Yeah.
But maybe you're right.
Maybe they didn't know about the money.
translation.es: Tal vez no sabían del dinero.

translation.en: They probably just wanted to get in and get out.
Just grab whatever they can get away with.
What if they come back?
[cashier] All right, right this way.
There you go.
Just ring when you're ready. Thank you.
[Adam] Babe.
[Adam] Dinner's on me.
[Katie] All right.
-Morning. -Morning.
I was just making you coffee.
Ms. Franklin, this is Detective Chesler. We spoke at Mr. Wellsley's house.
translation.es: Srta. Franklin, habla la detective Chesler. Hablamos en la casa del Sr. Wellsley.

translation.en: Would you give me a call when you get this message? You have the number. Thanks.
translation.es: ¿Me llamaría cuando reciba este mensaje? Tiene mi número. Gracias.

translation.en: Sorry to keep you waiting. Thanks for coming in.
translation.es: Lamento la espera. Gracias por venir.

translation.en: Detective. Is there a problem?
Why don't we talk back here?
Did Mr. Wellsley ever mention a will?
And no family?
He was all alone.
Well, something like this,
the rich old man, living alone, no heirs. We just have to cross all of our t's.
translation.es: un viejo rico, sin herederos, que vivía solo, tenemos que confirmar cada detalle.

translation.en: I'm sorry, Detective. [stammers] I don't...
What is this about?
Well, you said that Mr. Wellsley asked to be cremated.
translation.es: Dijo que el señor Wellsley pidió que lo cremaran.

translation.en: So I'm assuming that you want to honor his request.
translation.es: Así que supongo que quiere honrar su deseo.

translation.en: Yes.
Yes, we do.
Without a family and no will,
the question becomes who bears the cost of the arrangements.
translation.es: la pregunta es quién se hará cargo de los gastos.

translation.en: We'll take care of Leonard.
Okay. I've got the paperwork right here.
[Adam] What's that?
[Katie] His favorite tea.
Thanks.
For Leonard.
We should put the money back.
It doesn't feel right.
Let's just be here.
For Leonard.
[Katie] We should say something.
"And he shall be like a tree,
planted by the rivers of water.
translation.es: plantado al borde de las aguas,

translation.en: That bringeth forth his fruit in his season
translation.es: que produce fruto a su debido tiempo,

translation.en: and whatsoever he doeth shall prosper."
translation.es: todo lo que haga le saldrá bien".

translation.en: I'm sorry. Who are you?
Apologies, Ms. Franklin. My name is Julia Byron-Kim.
translation.es: Disculpe, señorita Franklin. Me llamo Julia Byron-Kim.

translation.en: I'm Mr. Wellsley's attorney.
translation.es: Soy la abogada del Sr. Wellsley.

translation.en: Ms. Byron-Kim,
Leonard never said anything about an attorney.
Please, call me Julia. And I'm not surprised.
translation.es: Llámenme Julia. Y no me sorprende.

translation.en: [Adam] What do you mean?
The first I heard from Mr. Wellsley was only a few weeks ago.
translation.es: Conocí al Sr. Wellsley hace unas semanas.

translation.en: He called me out of the blue, wanting me to write up his will,
translation.es: Me contactó para que escribiera su testamento

translation.en: and asked me to come to the house.
translation.es: y me pidió que viniera a la casa.

translation.en: -I never saw you here. -He was very specific about that.
translation.es: - Nunca la vi aquí. - Fue muy preciso con eso.

translation.en: I was to only come in the evenings.
Why?
He left everything to you.
-Oh, my God! -Congratulations.
[laughing] Oh, my God!
I don't even know what to say. This is...
translation.es: No sé qué decir. Esto es...

translation.en: Say thank you, Leonard!
Wow.
Okay, so what happens now?
First, I suggest you read over the will very carefully.
translation.es: Sugiero que lea cuidadosamente el testamento.

translation.en: Better yet, I would have your lawyer take a look.
translation.es: Mejor aún, haría que su abogado lo revisara.

translation.en: Actually, we don't have a lawyer.
Well, Mr. Wellsley did pay my retainer in advance,
translation.es: Bueno, el señor Wellsley pagó mi anticipo

translation.en: asked that I help you through this transition.
translation.es: y me pidió que la ayudara en esta transición.

translation.en: What transition? We can't just move in right away?
Of course you can, with the understanding that the will is going through probate,
translation.es: Claro que sí, pero hay que autentificar el testamento,

translation.en: which takes about three months.
translation.es: lo cual lleva unos tres meses.

translation.en: And if there are any surprises, you should have someone to look after your interests.
translation.es: Y, si hay alguna sorpresa, debería tener a alguien que cuide sus intereses.

translation.en: Now, I understand if you want to find your own lawyer.
translation.es: Entiendo si quieren buscar su propio abogado.

translation.en: You said Leonard called you out of the blue.
translation.es: Dijo que Leonard la llamó de la nada.

translation.en: You didn't know him?
I never met him before.
Why did he call you?
He found me on the Internet.
He said that he liked my name.
translation.es: Dijo que le gustaba mi nombre.

translation.en: Byron was his favorite poet.
Ms. Byron-Kim.
Sorry, Julia...
I'm kind of new at this.
I'm not really sure how to go about it officially,
translation.es: No estoy segura de cómo hacerlo oficialmente.

translation.en: but I could really use your help.
There are some big changes coming your way. I hope you're ready.
translation.es: Se avecinan grandes cambios. Espero que esté lista.

translation.en: Me too.
And how about Adam?
What about him?
Well, he does understand that legally, where it comes to this house, you make all the decisions.
translation.es: ¿Entiende que legalmente usted tomará todas las decisiones sobre esta casa?

translation.en: We've always decided things together.
Which is how it should be.
These things, you just never know how it can change someone.
translation.es: Nunca se sabe cómo estas cosas pueden cambiarnos.

translation.en: We'll be okay.
Good.
-Leave it to me then. -Great.
-Congratulations. -Thanks.
We should take a vacation for a month. Just first class all the way.
translation.es: Tomémonos un mes de vacaciones. Todo en primera clase.

translation.en: You'll get your MBA before you know it. Find a great job.
translation.es: Pronto tendrás tu título y conseguirás un buen trabajo.

translation.en: -That piece of junk that we drive. -We can pay off everything.
translation.es: - Esa basura que manejamos. - Podemos pagar todo.

translation.en: Credit cards, loans, just wipe the slate clean.
translation.es: Tarjetas de crédito, préstamos, empezar de cero.

translation.en: You know, we should go right now. Both of us. Just go pick brand new cars.
translation.es: Deberíamos ir ahora, juntos, a elegir autos nuevos.

translation.en: -Come on, Adam. I'm serious. -Yeah, me too.
translation.es: - Vamos, hablo en serio. - Yo también.

translation.en: -We can't do that. -Why not? We have the money.
translation.es: - No podemos. - ¿Por qué no? Tenemos el dinero.

translation.en: We can't just walk in there with all that cash. It'll look weird.
translation.es: No podemos andar con todo ese dinero. Se vería raro.

translation.en: -People are gonna ask questions. -Yeah. No. You're right.
translation.es: - La gente hará preguntas. - Sí, tienes razón.

translation.en: I did some research online and been looking into that.
Into what?
See there's ways we can make it work, right? We just spread the money around.
translation.es: Hay maneras de hacer que funcione. Debemos esparcir el dinero.

translation.en: Different banks, different kinds of accounts.
What are you talking about?
If we do this right, it's like nobody will ever know.
translation.es: Si lo hacemos bien, nadie se enterará.

translation.en: We can get away with so much in taxes.
We still have to be careful.
We have been careful, okay?
Don't you think it's time for us to treat ourselves?
translation.es: ¿No crees que es hora de darnos un gusto?

translation.en: You earned it.
God knows I have.
I mean maybe you're right, but we have to settle in first,
translation.es: Quizá tengas razón, pero primero tenemos que asentarnos,

translation.en: take things slow, you know. Just...
translation.es: tomar las cosas con calma. Solo...

translation.en: Just a little while longer. Okay?
translation.es: Solo un poco más de tiempo. ¿Sí?

translation.en: Yeah.
Okay.
We'll take it slow.
I'll call the movers. See how soon we can get them over here.
translation.es: Veré que tan rápido puede venir la empresa de mudanzas.

translation.en: What? We don't need any of this stuff.
What? It's our stuff. We've had it since we got married.
translation.es: Son nuestras cosas. Las tenemos desde que nos casamos.

translation.en: Yeah well, here, we'll keep the pictures and some of those books,
translation.es: Bueno, guardaremos las fotos y algunos libros.

translation.en: and we don't need the rest of this junk. What are we supposed to do with all of it?
translation.es: - No necesitamos el resto. - ¿Y qué haremos con todo esto?

translation.en: Just leave it for the next poor losers that have to live in this dump, right?
translation.es: Queda para los próximos que deban vivir en este basurero.

translation.en: -Jeez, Adam. -[phone rings]
Hello?
Yeah, that was five months ago and I already gave the police my statement.
translation.es: Sí, fue hace cinco meses y di mi declaración a la policía.

translation.en: Who was it who called you, sir?
I didn't get the name. He just said talk to someone at the front desk.
translation.es: No me dio su nombre. Solo dijo que pregunte en la recepción.

translation.en: I got nothing.
Mr. Kettner, everything okay?
He says somebody told him to come down, make a statement.
translation.es: Alguien le dijo que viniera a declarar.

translation.en: What's this regarding?
Like five months ago somebody robbed the Smile Diner, killed somebody.
translation.es: Hace cinco meses, alguien robó en el restaurante Smile y mató a alguien.

translation.en: You were at the diner that night? Yes.
translation.es: - ¿Estuvo en el restaurante esa noche? - Sí.

translation.en: Lucky you didn't get hurt. I kinda stopped the guy.
translation.es: - Qué suerte que no lo lastimaran. - Yo detuve al tipo.

translation.en: You did?
Yeah, in that situation, I reacted. My wife was working that night so...
translation.es: Sí, en esa situación, reaccioné. Mi esposa trabajaba esa noche...

translation.en: Ms. Franklin was there too?
translation.es: - ¿La Srta. Franklin también estaba? - Sí, pero no entiendo.

translation.en: Yeah, but what I don't understand is you already have the guy locked up.
translation.es: - ¿La Srta. Franklin también estaba? - Sí, pero no entiendo. Ya atraparon al culpable. ¿Para qué necesitan otra declaración?

translation.en: Why do they need another statement?
translation.es: Ya atraparon al culpable. ¿Para qué necesitan otra declaración?

translation.en: They don't.
What are you talking about?
That guy from the diner, Ray Gaskin.
translation.es: El tipo del restaurante, Ray Gaskin.

translation.en: -Yeah. -He's dead.
Somebody stabbed him in his cell a couple weeks ago.
translation.es: Lo apuñalaron en su celda hace unas semanas.

translation.en: So who called me?
Kind of wondering that myself.
Excuse me?
Hello, Katie. Do you remember me?
Yeah, what are you doing back here?
I know, a pain in the ass, right? But my client, he's driving me nuts.
translation.es: Lo sé, soy molesto, ¿no? Pero mi cliente me está volviendo loco.

translation.en: He just-- He absolutely loves the place. I think he wants to make an offer.
translation.es: Le encanta la casa. Creo que quiere hacer una oferta.

translation.en: I told you already.
It's not for sale.
Maybe, if I could speak with the owner myself, at least I can say I tried.
translation.es: Quizá, si pudiera hablar con el dueño, al menos podría decir que lo intenté.

translation.en: Look, I'm really busy and you can't just show up here like this, so...
translation.es: Mira, estoy muy ocupada y no puede entrar así, así que...

translation.en: I want you to go now. Please.
translation.es: Quiero que se vaya. Por favor.

translation.en: You know, Katie?
This ain't my first rodeo.
translation.es: Este no es mi primer rodeo.

translation.en: You know, one of the first lessons in real estate...
translation.es: Una de las primeras lecciones en bienes raíces...

translation.en: if you want to find new listings,
check the obituaries.
I know all about the late Mr. Wellsley.
translation.es: Sí, sé todo sobre el difunto señor Wellsley.

translation.en: Sad.
The house isn't for sale.
translation.es: La casa no está a la venta.

translation.en: You know, I've had my eye on this house for a couple years.
translation.es: Hace dos años que tengo esta casa en la mira.

translation.en: The old man...
kicks the bucket...
and you think you can just move in?
I'm gonna smile? Wish you well?
translation.es: ¿Y que voy a sonreír? ¿Que te desearé todo lo mejor?

translation.en: I own the house now.
What the hell are you saying? Leonard left it to me.
translation.es: - ¿De qué demonios hablas? - Leonard me la dejó.

translation.en: I have his will, I can prove it.
Yeah, well for five grand
I can make a new will that says it belongs to my dear Aunt Myrtle.
translation.es: puedo hacer otro testamento que diga que pertenece a mi tía Myrtle.

translation.en: I have a lawyer. Of course you do.
If you have any more questions, I suggest you talk to her
translation.es: Si tiene más preguntas, hable con ella.

translation.en: but, in the meantime, get the hell off my property before I call the police.
translation.es: Mientras tanto, lárguese de mi propiedad o llamaré a la policía.

translation.en: All right. Well, I guess I'll see you around, Katie.
translation.es: Bien. Supongo que nos veremos por ahí.

translation.en: He's just messing with you.
It's not how it sounded.
He practically accused me of forging the will.
translation.es: Prácticamente me acusó de haber falsificado el testamento.

translation.en: Babe, trust me.
The thing this guy cares about is what he's losing on commission.
translation.es: Solo le importa perderse una comisión.

translation.en: Maybe I should talk to Julia.
The lawyer?
Why?
In case Hayden tries to make trouble?
translation.es: ¿En caso de que Hayden trate de causar problemas?

translation.en: What could he do?
I don't know but it's like she said, we don't want any surprises right now.
translation.es: No sé, pero es como dijo, no queremos ninguna sorpresa.

translation.en: This guy is just pissed off. Forget about him.
translation.es: El tipo solo está enojado. Olvídate de él.

translation.en: Come on. It's our first night in our new house.
translation.es: Vamos. Es nuestra primera noche en la nueva casa.

translation.en: We should celebrate.
Yeah?
What did you have in mind?
I can think of something.
-Let me take a shower first. -What?
I've been cleaning the house all day. I'll be right out.
translation.es: Estuve limpiando la casa todo el día. Ya vuelvo.

translation.en: What is this?
My old one stopped working, so...
translation.es: Mi viejo reloj dejó de funcionar, así que...

translation.en: Looks expensive.
Well, it's a knock off. Just bought it from some guy downtown.
translation.es: Es falso. Se lo compré a un tipo en el centro.

translation.en: Very convincing.
You want company?
I'll be right out.
Detective!
-Looks like I came at a bad time. -No, you're fine. Come in.
translation.es: - Parece que llegué en mal momento. - No, está bien. Pase.

translation.en: You folks going somewhere?
Yeah, we're moving, actually, into Leonard's house.
translation.es: Sí, nos mudaremos a la casa de Leonard.

translation.en: Leonard?
As in Mr. Wellsley?
I know. I'm still getting used to the idea myself.
translation.es: Lo sé. Todavía me estoy acostumbrando a la idea.

translation.en: Leonard left it to me in his will.
translation.es: Leonard me la dejó en su testamento.

translation.en: Now then, that is a very nice house.
translation.es: Vaya. Es una casa muy bonita.

translation.en: Yes, it is.
-Congratulations. -Thank you.
So, a thing like that, what do they call it?
A windfall.
Doesn't happen every day.
Nope.
Funny you forgot to mention it.
translation.es: Es curioso que haya olvidado mencionarlo.

translation.en: What?
The will, and all, when we spoke.
translation.es: El testamento y eso, cuando hablamos.

translation.en: I asked you about his family, about a will.
translation.es: Le pregunté por su familia, por un testamento.

translation.en: Oh no, I didn't know about it until after the service. His lawyer came by.
translation.es: Me enteré después del funeral. Su abogada vino.

translation.en: That must've been quite a shock.
Yeah, it was.
I'd have loved to see the look on your face.
translation.es: Me hubiera encantado ver su cara.

translation.en: You know, I mean you worked there for...
what did you say? Four months?
Why are you here, Detective?
I was hoping to speak with your husband.
He's not here.
Well, maybe you can help me.
See, I was wondering
when you worked nights at that place, the Smile Diner,
translation.es: Cuando trabajaba de noche en el restaurante Smile,

translation.en: did he pick you up all the time?
I mean, he picked you up before.
translation.es: Ya la había pasado a buscar otra veces.

translation.en: Yeah.
Right, but was it a set thing?
Was it every night, was it certain nights?
No, not exactly.
So how did he happen to be there that night?
translation.es: ¿Cómo es que estuvo ahí esa noche?

translation.en: I-- I called him to pick me up and he came early to study.
translation.es: Lo llamé para que me buscase y fue temprano a estudiar.

translation.en: Well, you ought to play the lottery, Katie.
translation.es: Debería jugar a la lotería, Katie.

translation.en: You're a very lucky woman.
Does this have anything to do with the fact that
translation.es: ¿Esto tiene que ver con el hecho de que la policía

translation.en: the police called Adam about making another statement?
translation.es: haya llamado a Adam para que hiciera otra declaración?

translation.en: He didn't tell you?
Police never called Adam.
No, I was here. They called him down at the station.
translation.es: No, yo estaba aquí. Lo llamaron de la estación.

translation.en: No, I checked it out after he left.
translation.es: Lo revisé después de que se fue.

translation.en: There's no record of any calls to his number.
translation.es: No hay registro de llamadas a su número.

translation.en: That doesn't make any sense. Why would-- Why would anyone...
send him down there for no reason?
translation.es: ¿Por qué lo harían ir sin motivo?

translation.en: Well, maybe they had a reason.
Maybe it's just not the one you think.
translation.es: Tal vez no sea el que usted cree.

translation.en: Take care now.
[Katie] Thanks, Julia. I'll talk to you later, bye.
translation.es: Gracias, Julia. Te llamaré luego, adiós.

translation.en: What did she want?
I called her, actually.
What did you tell her?
Nothing.
That's not how it looked.
Looked like you guys were best friends all of a sudden.
translation.es: Parecía que eran amigas, de repente.

translation.en: Well, maybe if you'd been here, maybe if you'd answered your phone...
translation.es: Tal vez si hubieras estado aquí, si hubieras atendido el teléfono...

translation.en: We agreed.
We decided you were not going to talk to her. No, you decided.
translation.es: - Decidimos que no ibas a hablar con ella. - No, tú lo decidiste.

translation.en: Like you've been deciding a lot of things lately.
What are you even talking about?
Why didn't you tell me that it wasn't the police who called you?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no me dijiste que no fue la policía quien te llamó?

translation.en: It was somebody else who made sure you went down there, right?
translation.es: Alguien más se aseguró de que fueras, ¿no?

translation.en: Who told you that?
Detective Chesler dropped by.
And she was asking a lot of questions,
about you,
about what happened the night of the diner.
translation.es: sobre lo que pasó esa noche en el restaurante.

translation.en: What is that about, Adam?
[scoffs] How should I know? Who called?
-Who sent you to the police station? -I don't know!
translation.es: - ¿Quién te envió a la estación? - No sé.

translation.en: My bad, I was gonna tell you about it.
It's a whole lot of other stuff has been happening right now.
translation.es: Pero están pasando muchas otras cosas.

translation.en: What other stuff?
I think I'm being followed.
What?
I kind of had the feeling before.
Today, I just went driving around, just around.
translation.es: Hoy fui a dar unas vueltas en auto.

translation.en: I kept seeing the same car.
translation.es: Y vi el mismo auto muchas veces.

translation.en: Did you go to the bank?
-Come on, we said we would not do that. -No, Adam. No bullshit.
translation.es: - Dijimos que no lo haríamos. - Adam, no mientas.

translation.en: Just tell me. Did you go to the bank today?
Did you take money out?
I noticed him.
So I figured, you know, it wouldn't be a good idea. Just in case.
translation.es: Así que pensé que no sería una buena idea. Por si acaso.

translation.en: In case he was after the money.
-We don't know that. -Why else is he watching you?
translation.es: - No lo sabemos. - ¿Por qué más te seguiría?

translation.en: Look, maybe I'm just paranoid.
Okay? Maybe there's nobody who's following me. I don't know.
translation.es: Quizá nadie me esté siguiendo. No lo sé.

translation.en: You got sent down to the police station, Adam.
translation.es: Te hicieron ir a la policía, Adam.

translation.en: That way, I'm here alone.
That way, Hayden shows up, tries to intimidate me,
scare us out of the house. What is that? Why is he here?
translation.es: nos asusta tanto que nos vamos de la casa. ¿Por qué?

translation.en: Because he probably knows.
I warned you.
Hey, Tom.
You did?
Great.
Great, okay. Hold on.
All right, so probably just from the last four, five months.
translation.es: Probablemente solo de los últimos cuatro o cinco meses.

translation.en: We're looking for any checks drawn on an account from a Leonard Wellsley.
translation.es: Buscamos cheques cobrados de alguna cuenta de Leonard Wellsley.

translation.en: Yeah, made out to her name.
Yeah.
It's Kate... Franklin.
Listen, can you see what you got on the husband too?
It's a different last name.
It's an Adam Kettner with a "K."
Great, get back to me as soon as you can. Thanks.
translation.es: Llámame tan pronto como puedas. Gracias.

translation.en: What are you looking for?
Leonard didn't just stash that money.
translation.es: Leonard no solo escondió ese dinero.

translation.en: It had to come from somewhere. There has to be a reason.
translation.es: Salió de algún lado. Debe haber algún motivo.

translation.en: Does that even matter now?
Julia said...
if they find out we've been hiding something illegal,
translation.es: ...que, si descubren que ocultamos algo ilegal,

translation.en: we could lose everything.
All right.
So what do you suggest? We just give it all back?
I don't know.
Yeah, maybe.
-To whom, Katie? -I don't know!
But this never felt right.
translation.es: Pero esto nunca se sintió bien.

translation.en: I'm not going back to the way things were before.
translation.es: No volveré a como estábamos antes.

translation.en: We may not have a choice.
We always have a choice.
I had absolutely no idea that Mr. Wellsley left Katie the house.
translation.es: No tenía idea de que el señor Wellsley le había dejado la casa a Katie.

translation.en: That seems a little...
excessive.
Doesn't it, though?
Yeah.
What can you tell me about her husband?
I've never met the man.
So you had nothing to do with hiring him?
translation.es: ¿No tuvo nada que ver con contratarlo?

translation.en: As a gardener at the house.
No. It's strictly against our policy for family members to work together.
translation.es: No. Va contra nuestras políticas que familiares trabajen juntos.

translation.en: Our patients are elderly, infirm.
We can't risk that kind of potential distraction.
translation.es: No podemos arriesgarnos a esas posibles distracciones.

translation.en: So, do you know of Ms. Franklin ever breaking the rules before?
translation.es: ¿Sabe de alguna otra ocasión en la que la Srta. Franklin haya roto las reglas?

translation.en: Never, no.
No, she absolutely understood the importance of her job, especially...
translation.es: Ella entendía la importancia de su trabajo. - En especial con el Sr. Wellsley. - ¿Por qué con él?

translation.en: with Mr. Wellsley. Why especially him?
translation.es: - En especial con el Sr. Wellsley. - ¿Por qué con él?

translation.en: Well, you wouldn't have known it to look at him, but his health was very delicate.
translation.es: No se notaba al verlo, pero su salud era muy delicada.

translation.en: You know, Katie told me, she kept a notebook,
translation.es: Katie me dijo que tenía un anotador,

translation.en: like, a daily log, just to keep track of his medication.
translation.es: como un registro, solo para controlar su medicación.

translation.en: Do you happen to have a record of his medications?
You'd have to speak with his doctor about that.
translation.es: Tendría que hablar con su médico por eso.

translation.en: Right. How about Ms. Franklin's contract, how much she was being paid?
translation.es: Sí. ¿Y el contrato de la Srta. Franklin? ¿Cuánto le pagaban?

translation.en: Yeah, sure, we can get that to you.
-Yeah. -Excellent. Thank you. And let me...
just ask you. Did she...
Did she ever mention a raise?
Good lord.
She deposited that check just before Wellsley died.
translation.es: Depositó ese cheque justo antes de que Wellsley muriera.

translation.en: Was she really taking money from that poor old man all along?
translation.es: ¿De verdad le sacaba dinero a ese pobre anciano?

translation.en: It's a good question.
Adam?
Adam!
Shit!
Ethan?
These were never cashed.
You okay?
I think I know who that is.
What?
Leonard said something about hiring a gardener.
translation.es: Leonard dijo algo sobre un jardinero.

translation.en: I think I told you about this.
A guy named Ethan. This was a couple years ago.
translation.es: Un tal Ethan. Hace algunos años.

translation.en: So he's been up there for a while.
translation.es: Así que hace tiempo que está ahí.

translation.en: There were checks made out to Ethan Doyle.
translation.es: Había cheques a nombre de Ethan Doyle.

translation.en: They were never cashed.
Leonard said, one day, he just stopped showing up.
translation.es: Leonard dijo que un día dejó de aparecer.

translation.en: Never heard from him again.
translation.es: No volvió a saber de él.

translation.en: Somebody shot him.
You looked?
He must have bled to death up there.
He was murdered.
Yeah. I think so.
But...
Leonard couldn't have known he was there.
translation.es: ...Leonard no debía saber que estaba ahí.

translation.en: Right? I mean, he would have helped him.
And why would Doyle hide out in the shed? Why not... come into the house?
translation.es: ¿Y por qué Doyle se escondió allí? ¿Por qué no entró a la casa?

translation.en: Maybe these have something to do with it.
translation.es: Quizá tenga que ver con estos.

translation.en: Take a guess.
Wow.
-Do you think they're real? -Why else would he hide them?
Shit!
Here! Just--
-Oh, God! -Oh, my God.
Give them here. Come on.
-I'm sorry. -Dammit.
-Don't answer. -[Mr. Calvern] I saw your car.
But I can't. My car is parked outside. They know I'm here.
translation.es: Mi auto está afuera. Saben que estoy aquí.

translation.en: -Okay, I'm just gonna... -I got it.
translation.es: - Bien, iré y... - Yo me encargo.

translation.en: [Mr. Calvern] Open the door! Do you hear me? Katie!
[Mr. Calvern] Katie, open the door please!
I'm sorry. This really isn't a good time.
translation.es: Lo siento. No es un buen momento.

translation.en: Well, yeah. I'm sure you're very busy settling into your new home.
translation.es: Estoy seguro de que estás ocupada en tu nuevo hogar.

translation.en: You should be ashamed of yourself.
How could you take advantage of that poor man?
translation.es: ¿Cómo pudiste aprovecharte de ese pobre hombre?

translation.en: -What? -Look, I knew something was up. I could feel it.
translation.es: - ¿Qué? - Sabía que algo pasaba. Lo presentía.

translation.en: But you know what? You had him so frightened he couldn't even tell me.
translation.es: Pero lo tenías tan asustado que no pudo decírmelo.

translation.en: It's not-- No!
I'm not letting you tarnish my company's good name.
translation.es: No dejaré que hundas mi compañía.

translation.en: -Mr. Calvern-- -I'll find proof! I'm gonna call the police!
translation.es: - Sr. Calvern. - Buscaré pruebas. Llamaré a la policía.

translation.en: -I'm gonna have you arrested! -This really isn't a good time.
translation.es: - Haré que te arresten... - No es un buen momento.

translation.en: [shouting] This isn't over, Katie!
I'll be back!
I'm gonna find out what's been going on in this house, one way or another!
translation.es: ¡Voy a averiguar qué pasó en esta casa, de una forma u otra!

translation.en: I'm not letting this go! You hear me? I'm not gonna lose my business over this!
translation.es: ¡No dejaré que te salgas con la tuya! ¡No voy a perder mi negocio por esto!

translation.en: Why isn't this full?
[Adam] Katie?
[Adam] Hey, Katie!
Hey.
-Didn't you hear me? -Hi, sorry. I was making tea.
translation.es: - ¿No me oíste? - Hola, perdón. Hacía té.

translation.en: You want some?
No. I got you a present.
A new phone?
Yeah. Got one for each of us.
New numbers too. I figured the way things were going, we could both use a little privacy.
translation.es: Nuevos números. Creí que nos vendría bien tener algo de privacidad.

translation.en: We can't keep them.
-Katie-- -Adam, no.
There is a dead man out there. He was murdered.
translation.es: Ahí afuera hay un hombre muerto. Lo asesinaron.

translation.en: He stole those diamonds.
And who knows what else he may have done, who he may have hurt.
translation.es: Y quién sabe qué más puede haber hecho, a quién puede haber lastimado.

translation.en: These things don't just go away like they never happened.
-The police must be looking for him. -Don't you get this?
translation.es: - La policía debe estar buscándolo. - ¿No lo entiendes?

translation.en: Doyle stole the diamonds, got himself shot, and then he died out there all by himself.
translation.es: Doyle robó los diamantes, recibió un disparo y murió allí solo,

translation.en: It's like-- It's like he fell down a well.
translation.es: como si se hubiera caído en un pozo.

translation.en: Two years later,
translation.es: Dos años después, nadie sabe qué le pasó a él ni a los diamantes.

translation.en: nobody knows what happened to him or the diamonds. We can do whatever we want.
translation.es: Dos años después, nadie sabe qué le pasó a él ni a los diamantes. Podemos hacer lo que queramos.

translation.en: -What are you doing? -I'm calling Detective Chesler.
translation.es: - ¿Qué haces? - Llamaré a la detective Chesler.

translation.en: -We need to tell her-- -No! Wait!
Wait, just-- Okay, hang on. Just listen to me for just a second.
translation.es: Espera, espera. Solo escúchame un segundo.

translation.en: Okay, ask yourself. What the heck was Doyle doing here in the first place?
translation.es: Pregúntate esto. ¿Qué demonios hacia Doyle aquí en primer lugar?

translation.en: Why take some crappy gardening job
if he's planning to steal a fortune in diamonds?
translation.es: si planeaba robar una fortuna en diamantes?

translation.en: I don't know.
Some old guy's house digging up weeds
is the last place that anybody's gonna come looking for him.
translation.es: limpiando la maleza en la casa de un viejo.

translation.en: I mean, think about it. Why else wouldn't he cash the checks?
translation.es: Piénsalo. ¿Por qué no cobró los cheques?

translation.en: He didn't want to leave a paper trail.
That way he sets up the big score.
Nobody knows about this place and he can just hide here
translation.es: Nadie sabía de este lugar. Podía esconderse aquí todo el tiempo que necesitara.

translation.en: for as long as he needs to.
translation.es: Podía esconderse aquí todo el tiempo que necesitara.

translation.en: Although, I'm sure that getting shot and dying out there
translation.es: Aunque seguro que recibir un balazo y morir no era parte del plan.

translation.en: -was probably not a part of the plan. -That doesn't change anything.
translation.es: Aunque seguro que recibir un balazo y morir no era parte del plan. Eso no cambia nada. No podemos quedarnos esos diamantes.

translation.en: We can't keep those diamonds.
translation.es: Eso no cambia nada. No podemos quedarnos esos diamantes.

translation.en: All right, so what about the money?
What are we gonna do about that?
What do you mean?
If we do this, then the police put us under a microscope,
translation.es: Si hacemos esto, la policía nos investigará a fondo.

translation.en: so how is that going to look?
We took the money from here and then we hid it in the bank. What are they gonna think?
translation.es: Tomamos el dinero y lo guardamos. ¿Qué van a pensar?

translation.en: We'll explain it to them.
Tell them it was Leonard's money, that it was his safety net.
translation.es: Diremos que era el dinero de Leonard, sus ahorros.

translation.en: All right, and then what?
'Cause you heard what the lawyer said. Even if they believe us,
translation.es: Oíste a la abogada. Aunque nos crean y no terminemos presos, podríamos perder esta casa.

translation.en: even if we don't end up in jail, we could still lose this place.
translation.es: Aunque nos crean y no terminemos presos, podríamos perder esta casa.

translation.en: We don't need this house, Adam!
We don't need any of this.
Okay? As long as we have each other, we're going to be all right.
translation.es: Mientras nos tengamos el uno al otro, estaremos bien.

translation.en: All right?
I'm done with all right.
That's not enough anymore.
I told you. I'm not going back to the way things were before.
translation.es: Te lo dije. No volveré a como estábamos antes.

translation.en: And what about that man out there? What are we supposed to do about that?
translation.es: ¿Y qué hay de ese hombre? ¿Qué hacemos al respecto?

translation.en: Pretend it never happened?
I'll take care of it.
How? How are you gonna do that?
This house
belongs to us now.
Okay, this is our future.
I'm not gonna let anybody take that away from us.
translation.es: No dejaré que nadie nos la quite.

translation.en: Look, everything is gonna be okay.
I'll take care of this for you.
[whispering] What are you doing?
[whispering] Someone's in the house.
[whispering] Where did you get that?
[whispering] Adam.
-[whispering] Don't. -[whispering] Don't move.
[whispering] We need to call 911.
Freeze, asshole!
Oh, my God.
How are you holding up, Katie?
Hell of a thing.
It was an accident.
Yeah, that's what they're saying.
Either way, law says it's self-defense, so...
translation.es: De cualquier modo, fue en defensa propia.

translation.en: It still makes you wonder.
What was going through his head?
Why would he do something like that?
Just let himself into the house?
translation.es: ¿Por qué se metió en la casa?

translation.en: I don't know.
Something had to set him off.
I know none of this is you, Katie.
translation.es: Sé que nada es tu culpa.

translation.en: What?
Everything was fine around here until Adam started work.
translation.es: Todo estaba bien hasta que Adam empezó a trabajar.

translation.en: So you can tell me whatever is going on.
translation.es: Así que puedes decirme qué está pasando.

translation.en: I know that none of it is you.
translation.es: Sé que nada es tu culpa.

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about.
I know about your money problems.
translation.es: Sé de tus problemas de dinero.

translation.en: I know what that does to people.
I know about the big check that you deposited from Mr. Wellsley.
translation.es: Sé del gran cheque del señor Wellsley que depositaste.

translation.en: You don't understand.
Okay, don't say anything, Katie. Just--
Just listen for a second.
Because...
could be that...
it was a loan, maybe it was a gift, who's to say?
translation.es: ...haya sido un préstamo. Tal vez fue un regalo, ¿quién sabe?

translation.en: But I want you to put yourself in my shoes. The big picture.
translation.es: Pero ponte en mi lugar y mira el panorama general.

translation.en: How all of a sudden, everything just drops in your lap.
translation.es: De repente, todo cae en tu regazo.

translation.en: -I told you-- -I mean, here I am,
the coroner tells me that the old guy died in his sleep.
translation.es: El forense dice que el viejo murió mientras dormía.

translation.en: You tell me what his last wish was. And I figure, sure, why not?
translation.es: Tú me dices cuál era su última voluntad, y me digo: "¿Por qué no?".

translation.en: But it is not until after he's cremated
translation.es: Pero no es hasta después de que lo creman...

translation.en: that you find a will.
translation.es: - ...que encuentras un testamento. - No lo encontré.

translation.en: I didn't find it, I didn't even know about it.
translation.es: - ...que encuentras un testamento. - No lo encontré. - Ni sabía que existía. - Y yo ni siquiera tengo un cuerpo.

translation.en: And I don't even have a body.
translation.es: - Ni sabía que existía. - Y yo ni siquiera tengo un cuerpo.

translation.en: I can't even prove that he didn't die a natural death.
translation.es: Ni siquiera puedo probar que no murió de muerte natural.

translation.en: I mean I gotta tell you, it's starting to keep me up at night.
translation.es: Debo decir que esto no me deja dormir.

translation.en: I would never hurt Leonard.
I am not talking about you.
What?
Has Adam ever mentioned anyone by the name of Gaskin, a Ray Gaskin?
translation.es: ¿Adam mencionó alguna vez a un tal Ray Gaskin?

translation.en: I know that name. 'Cause he tried to rob the diner that night,
translation.es: - Conozco ese nombre. - Porque trató de robar el restaurante.

translation.en: and he also worked as a janitor at the university
translation.es: Trabajaba como conserje en la universidad

translation.en: while Adam was taking classes.
-No, that's not... No. -Okay.
It's a big school. Maybe they never met.
translation.es: La universidad es grande. Quizá nunca se conocieron.

translation.en: But sooner or later...
Adam is going to screw up.
It's only a matter of time.
Don't let him take you down with him.
translation.es: No dejes que te arrastre con él.

translation.en: You come to me.
Baby.
They wanna talk to you.
Hell of a thing.
-Katie! -Hey.
I heard what happened. Are you all right? I've been trying to call you.
translation.es: Oí lo que pasó. ¿Estás bien? Intenté llamarte.

translation.en: My number's been changed.
I need to talk to you.
-Yeah. Come upstairs. -Okay.
And this Detective Chesler, do you believe her?
translation.es: ¿Y le crees a la detective Chesler?

translation.en: Is it possible that Adam had anything to do with what happened at the diner that night?
translation.es: ¿Es posible que Adam haya tenido algo que ver con lo del restaurante?

translation.en: I don't know what to believe.
Did Adam have any problems with Mr. Wellsley?
translation.es: ¿Adam tuvo algún problema con el señor Wellsley?

translation.en: -Any issues? -No.
No, nothing.
If the police suspect that Adam had anything to do with his death,
translation.es: Si la policía sospecha que Adam tuvo que ver con su muerte,

translation.en: they'll try to find a motive.
They're gonna try to claim that he hurried things along.
translation.es: Intentarán probar que aceleró las cosas.

translation.en: He hated being poor.
Okay, listen to me.
If Chesler thinks she can make a case, she's not gonna waste any time.
translation.es: Si Chesler cree que puede armar un caso, no perderá tiempo.

translation.en: She's gonna try to get a warrant and search the house right away.
translation.es: Conseguirá una orden y registrará la casa.

translation.en: Can she do that? You need to be asking yourself, will she find anything?
You need to promise me.
Promise me
that you'll help Adam too.
It's gone.
What?
The money.
Adam must have taken it.
That's what you found? Cash?
Yeah...
in the attic.
We thought it was stolen at first but...
translation.es: Al principio creímos que era robado, pero...

translation.en: And then what changed your mind?
The diamonds.
So you found diamonds in the house?
In the living space above the garage.
translation.es: En la habitación arriba del garaje.

translation.en: Does Adam have these diamonds?
Yeah.
You need to stop him.
What? Why?
He knows you suspect something. That's why he took the money.
translation.es: Sabe que sospechas. Por eso tomó el dinero.

translation.en: He disappears and throws you to the cops. No, Adam would never do that.
translation.es: - Desaparecerá y te acusará. - No, Adam no haría eso.

translation.en: Are you sure?
You need to find him, bring him to the house and then call me.
translation.es: Debes encontrarlo, llevarlo a la casa y luego llamarme.

translation.en: -You're not coming with me? -I need to hold off Detective Chesler.
translation.es: - ¿No vendrás? - Debo detener a la detective Chesler.

translation.en: I don't want her serving the search warrant till we know Adam's in the house.
translation.es: No quiero que allane la casa hasta que tengamos a Adam.

translation.en: -Detective Chesler. -Detective Johnson.
What have we got?
Garbage truck was making its rounds this morning, called it in.
translation.es: El camión de basura hacía sus rondas esta mañana, nos llamó.

translation.en: -How long's he been in there? -ME's still en route.
translation.es: - ¿Cuánto lleva ahí? - El forense está en camino.

translation.en: You beat him here.
Damn.
Why did you call me?
There was a backpack next to the vic. Inside we found an old laundry receipt.
translation.es: Había una mochila junto a la víctima. Tenía un viejo recibo de lavandería.

translation.en: It's pretty faded, but... the address matches the name from one of your cases.
translation.es: Está desteñido, pero la dirección coincide con la de uno de sus casos.

translation.en: What's the name?
Come on, Adam, pick up.
-Where've you been? -Adam!
I'm up half the night talking to the cops.
translation.es: Paso toda la noche hablando con la policía.

translation.en: I wake up in the morning, you're already gone.
translation.es: Me levanto a la mañana y no estás.

translation.en: There's no note. You haven't answered your phone all day.
translation.es: No hay ninguna nota. No atiendes el teléfono.

translation.en: -Where've you been, Katie? -The bank.
That's one of the things I need to talk to you about.
-Why did you take the money? -Cause we're in a lot of trouble.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué tomate el dinero? - Estamos en problemas.

translation.en: Checked up on that real estate agent, Hayden.
translation.es: Investigué a ese agente de bienes raíces, Hayden.

translation.en: I mean, what's this guy's deal? Why's he so interested in selling this particular house?
translation.es: ¿Qué le pasa? ¿Por qué le interesa tanto esta casa en particular?

translation.en: Guess what?
There's no record of a Mickey Hayden getting a real estate license.
translation.es: No hay ningún Mickey Hayden registrado como agente.

translation.en: -What? -Yeah. He just got released from prison.
Did a couple years for robbing a jewelry store.
translation.es: Estuvo preso por robar una joyería.

translation.en: Jewelry?
One of those spots downtown. Doesn't even use a gun.
translation.es: - ¿Una joyería? - Una del centro. Ni siquiera usó un arma. Solo los convenció para pasar.

translation.en: He just sweet talks his way through the security door,
translation.es: Ni siquiera usó un arma. Solo los convenció para pasar.

translation.en: then he blindsides the armed guard,
does some old school, like, smash-and-grab.
translation.es: y tomó el botín como un ladrón de la vieja escuela.

translation.en: Sixty seconds, comes out with three million dollars in loose diamonds that were never recovered.
translation.es: En sesenta segundos, salió con tres millones en diamantes sueltos.

translation.en: -That's why he was here. -Hang on, it gets better.
translation.es: - Por eso estuvo aquí. - Se pone mejor.

translation.en: Cops think that he had an accomplice that they never found. You wanna take a wild guess?
translation.es: La policía cree que tuvo un cómplice que no encontraron. ¿Quieres adivinar?

translation.en: This other guy gets shot during the burglary, then he gets away.
translation.es: Al otro tipo le dispararon durante el robo, pero se escapó.

translation.en: Doyle got away with the diamonds.
translation.es: Doyle se escapó con los diamantes.

translation.en: And...
there's only one other person who could've known about it.
translation.es: ...solo hay una persona que podría saberlo.

translation.en: The one who shot him.
This bastard didn't bother to use a fake name. What did he think? We weren't smart enough to figure it out?
translation.es: Ni se molestó en usar un nombre falso. ¿Pensó que éramos idiotas?

translation.en: We have to call the police.
No, the only thing that we need to do is get the hell out of Dodge.
translation.es: No, lo que tenemos que hacer es largarnos de aquí, rápido.

translation.en: We got plenty of travel money, so... сan you go pack some stuff up real fast?
translation.es: Tenemos mucho dinero para viajar, ¿puedes empacar rápido?

translation.en: I'm gonna go get cleaned up.
You were never gonna leave me.
What? No, why would I ever leave you?
Get changed.
Hi, Julia.
It's Katie.
Yeah, he's here, but... listen, it wasn't him.
translation.es: Sí, está aquí, pero no fue él.

translation.en: Where are they?
I don't know.
Call him out here.
Adam?
Adam?
Adam!
Right here, baby.
Let her go.
Look, I just want the diamonds. I said let her go.
translation.es: - Solo quiero los diamantes. - Que la dejes ir.

translation.en: I've been waiting a long time for this.
So how about you just tell me where they are?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si me dices dónde están?

translation.en: Some place you're never gonna find them.
translation.es: En un lugar donde nunca los encontrarás.

translation.en: Are you gonna shoot me, kid?
That's right.
'Cause if I just give you the diamonds, you'll shoot both of us.
translation.es: Si te doy los diamantes, nos dispararás a los dos.

translation.en: Here's the thing though.
Even if you hit me from there...
my gun's gonna go off, and it's gonna blow a hole in her the size of your head.
translation.es: mi arma se disparará y le hará un agujero del tamaño de tu cabeza.

translation.en: And we don't want that now, do we?
So, let's just talk about this.
Adam!
Son of a bitch.
Adam!
No!
Adam!
Baby...
Adam!
Baby!
Please.
...in the garden.
Stay with me, baby.
Oh, my God.
Here, Katie.
I'm sorry.
Here, sit.
Hey.
Katie, listen.
We need to look for the diamonds before the police get here. Do you understand?
translation.es: Debemos buscar los diamantes antes de que llegue la policía, ¿sí?

translation.en: It's the only way we can explain what happened without implicating you.
translation.es: Es la única manera de explicar lo que pasó sin implicarte.

translation.en: -Adam never would have hurt Leonard. -Katie, the diamonds.
translation.es: - Adam nunca hubiera lastimado a Leonard. - Los diamantes.

translation.en: How could I have ever thought that?
It was Hayden.
Hayden... killed him with an overdose.
translation.es: Hayden lo mató con una sobredosis.

translation.en: He read the logbook, the one I kept for Leonard's medication.
translation.es: Leyó el cuaderno en el que anotaba los medicamentos.

translation.en: I found the empty pill bottle.
How do you know it was Hayden?
Leonard used to tell me all the time that he could hear someone in the house,
translation.es: Leonard solía decirme que oía a alguien en la casa,

translation.en: but I never-- I...
It was Hayden.
Looking for the diamonds.
-He couldn't find them. -But you did?
translation.es: - No los encontró. - Pero tú sí.

translation.en: I don't understand.
Why did Hayden shoot Doyle?
translation.es: ¿Por qué Hayden le disparó a Doyle?

translation.en: Why didn't-- Why didn't he end up with the diamonds?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no se quedó con los diamantes?

translation.en: Because he wasn't half as smart as he wanted you to think.
translation.es: Porque no era tan inteligente como quería que pensaras.

translation.en: I mean how smart do you have to be to decide to rip off your partner,
translation.es: ¿Cuán inteligente debes ser para traicionar a tu compañero,

translation.en: shoot him while the cops are rolling up,
translation.es: dispararle mientras la policía los busca

translation.en: and he still gets away with three million dollars in diamonds?
translation.es: y que aun así él se escape con tres millones en diamantes?

translation.en: Meanwhile, you get busted and spend two years in prison.
translation.es: Entretanto, a él lo atraparon y pasó dos años preso.

translation.en: I never told you how much the diamonds are worth.
translation.es: Nunca te dije el valor de los diamantes.

translation.en: Oops.
-What are you doing? -Look, okay, I paid my dues.
Okay, I spent ten years as a public defender.
How do you think I got Hayden's case?
translation.es: ¿Cómo crees que conseguí el caso de Hayden?

translation.en: I knew he was an idiot. But I believed his story.
translation.es: Sabía que era un idiota. Pero creí en su historia.

translation.en: And we had an agreement, an understanding, and, of course, he messes everything up.
translation.es: Y teníamos un acuerdo y, por supuesto, lo arruinó todo.

translation.en: I plea bargained his charges down to two years.
translation.es: Logré bajar su condena a dos años.

translation.en: I traced Doyle back to when he worked for Leonard.
translation.es: Rastreé a Doyle y supe que trabajó para Leonard.

translation.en: But the only thing that I couldn't figure out
translation.es: Pero lo único que no podía descubrir

translation.en: was where he was.
Turns out Doyle was dead.
You helped kill Leonard?
No, I had nothing to do with that, okay? That was all Hayden. He got impatient.
translation.es: No, no tuve nada que ver con eso, ¿sí? Ese fue Hayden. Se puso impaciente.

translation.en: He wanted to hurry things along, but I did have to do some fast maneuvering
translation.es: Quería apurar las cosas, pero tuve que hacer maniobras rápidas

translation.en: to cover up for him.
The will.
It isn't real, is it? It's real enough.
translation.es: - No es real, ¿no? - Es lo suficientemente real.

translation.en: With no one to contest it, what's the difference?
translation.es: Sin nadie que lo dispute, es lo mismo.

translation.en: Look, I'm sure Leonard would've given you the house if he was alive,
translation.es: Estoy segura de que Leonard te habría dado la casa,

translation.en: but that is beside the point.
translation.es: pero eso no viene al caso.

translation.en: Right now, I need you to tell me where the diamonds are.
translation.es: Ahora necesito que me digas dónde están los diamantes.

translation.en: I don't know.
Adam hid them.
I really don't know where they are.
But I wouldn't tell you if I did.
translation.es: Y, si lo supiera, no te lo diría.

translation.en: You know, that's what I really liked about you.
translation.es: Eso es lo que me gustaba de ti.

translation.en: -[cocks gun] -It was never about the money.
But I'm sure they'll turn up.
These things always do.
-Katie? -Detective!
I'm Julia Byron-Kim. I'm Ms. Franklin's attorney.
translation.es: Soy Julia Byron-Kim, la abogada de la señorita Franklin.

translation.en: Well, Ms. Byron-Kim,
I'm gonna need you to step out so I can see both your hands.
translation.es: necesito que me muestre las dos manos.

translation.en: If you just give me a minute to explain on behalf of my client.
translation.es: Deme un minuto para explicar por mi clienta...

translation.en: Show me your hands. Right now! All right.
-Detective, if you would just listen-- -Look out!
Stay back.
Are you okay?
Are you okay?
You're okay, sweetie. You're okay.
Come on.
Come on. Let's get you out of here, come on.
This is Detective Chesler.
I'm requesting a back-up and an ambulance
at 127 Queens.
FOUR MONTHS LATER
-Hey. -Detective.
Sorry, I tried knocking.
translation.es: Lo siento, intenté llamar a la puerta.

translation.en: Sorry, I was...
a million miles away.
A young cedar.
This is a nice spot.
-Lots of sun. -Yeah, I think so.
-It's good to see you. -And it's good to see you.
translation.es: - Qué bueno verte. - Lo mismo digo.

translation.en: You look beautiful.
Thank you.
Yeah, we're...
We're doing well.
Well I just came by to let you know that the case is officially closed.
translation.es: Vine a avisarte que el caso está oficialmente cerrado.

translation.en: Mickey Hayden and Julia Byron-Kim are the only suspects on record.
translation.es: Mickey Hayden y Julia Byron-Kim son los únicos sospechosos.

translation.en: So your baby won't grow up to someday find out her father had a criminal history.
translation.es: Para que tu bebé no crezca y se entere de que su padre tenía antecedentes.

translation.en: Thank you, Detective.
We've been through that place a half a dozen times,
translation.es: Revisamos ese lugar media docena de veces.

translation.en: top to bottom.
Still can't figure it out.
He didn't tell me.
I really don't know where Adam hid the diamonds.
translation.es: Realmente no sé dónde escondió los diamantes.

translation.en: I'm sorry, though. I wish I did.
Take care of yourself, Katie.
You too.
♪ And I'll be standing next to you ♪
